title: Ceramic glazes
brief_description: Demonstrates the mixing of an opaque matt and stone glaze, both showing wide firing latitude and high colour receptivity. Glaze application by several methods is shown. Kiln interiors at intervals during firing show the progressive stages of the glaze.
description: Demonstrates the mixing of an opaque matt and stone glaze, both showing wide firing latitude and high colour receptivity. Glaze application by several methods is shown. Kiln interiors at intervals during firing show the progressive stages of the glaze.
